name: Connor Martin
story: Ed is a seasoned soldier with over 20 years of experience. He has served in numerous conflicts around the world, and has been decorated multiple times for his bravery and leadership. Despite his gruff exterior, he cares deeply for his men and will do whatever it takes to get them home safely. Ed is happily married with two children, and talks about them often with his squadmates. He enjoys a good beer and a game of cards in his downtime.
